data.text: @evensdurand It's our honor to serve our veterans and active duty military members! - SG

Sit back and relax as we continue our climb into the clouds. ⛅

📸: hb_spotting https://t.co/IiSYytaZBC

@LawlessReilly I'm sincerely sorry to hear that your flight was disrupted. Though we understand the importance of getting you to your destination on time, we would never sacrifice safety to meet an on-time departure or arrival. Feel free to send us a PM if you need further assistance. - SG

@AnthonyFlyer Hey Anthony! Thank you so much for taking the time to share this positive feedback and recognize the efforts of our crew members. We are honored to serve you. 😊 - C
#togetherwefly

@rivasidelos Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. Please be aware that our ticket counters will open two hours prior to the time of departure, but not before then. The ticket counters will then close promptly 45 minutes prior to departure. If you have further questions, please send us a DM. - C

data.text: @MauiSunrise7 Hi Elise! Thanks for reaching out to us. If the customer you are referring to is in need of assistance, they are welcome to reach out to us directly. We are available through FB and TW and we also have agents staffed 24/7 to assist customers over the phone at (702) 505-8888. - C

data.text: Tis the season for ugly sweaters - especially on #NationalUglySweaterDay! May it be merry, bright, and full of light! Happy holidays from our Allegiant Air family to yours. ❄❄ https://t.co/Tqyo7nj6Uv
@wutitis101 We'd be happy to review your charges, if you'd like! Please send us a DM with your itinerary information and someone from our team will be able to take a look. - SG
@jess122491 Gift cards are definitely something we'd like to offer sometime soon! Thanks for flying with us and for all of your support! - SG

@Sammeeeeee Because we do not have flights throughout the day at many of the airports we serve, we do not provide continuous staffing at the airport. If you need assistance from our team, please feel free to send us a DM! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@peterla37745743 I'm sincerely sorry to hear about your experience, Peter. Please send us a DM if you need any assistance from our team. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG

@ivanfatovic to provide us with this feedback. While I cannot undo the circumstances, these observations have been shared with the appropriate department leadership for internal follow up to ensure that any necessary corrective counseling is provided. - Lupe

@ivanfatovic and those around them. Our team members are expected to enforce this policy, as well as remain professional and respectful. Allegiant also requires team members to wear a face mask/covering over their mouth and nose at all times. We greatly appreciate the time that you have taken

@ivanfatovic We are very sorry to learn of the uncomfortable experience you had on this flight, as it is never our intention to cause discomfort during travel. All passengers are required to wear a face mask/covering over their mouth and nose at all times when traveling to help protect them

urls.title: Lost and Found
urls.description: Please note that NYC Transit now offers shipping of recovered lost items. When the item is found, having your item(s) shipped saves you a trip to the Lost and Found Office, at the 34th Street-Penn Station lower mezzanine of the A, C and E subway train lines. We encourage you to take advantage of this shipping convenience. It’s fast, easy, and safe. Please, always wait for an email and/or text message from us if you want to pick up a found item before dropping

data.text: @MarshaMReeder Hi Marsha, passengers with lost & found issues are asked to go to the airport where the articles were lost. You may also complete a lost item form by visiting: https://t.co/5XnsaVY2T5. -Nicole

@AHEART0FSTONE Hi Marissa, we certainly understand and we are more than happy to extend your voucher. Please feel free to send us a direct message if you are in need of any assistance. -Nicole https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@BethGross1234 We look forward having you onboard with us! 🥳 - Lupe
@PeripateNic Can't wait for you to fly with us again soon! 🙌😁 - Lupe

@ParthVenkat Happy to provide reminders 😁 - Lupe
@one_eyeblind Hi Derek! We're sorry to hear about any frustrations. Please send us a DM, we would be happy to help. - Lupe
@alyssangelgreen Hi Alyssa! If you have a voucher that is going to expire soon, please send us a DM, we will be happy to extend it for you! - Lupe
@BethGross1234 Hi Beth! Please send us a DM and we will be happy to extend the voucher for you! - Lupe

Sometimes the best way to get the job done is not by going big, but by going small - really, really small. Allegiant's antimicrobial protectant forms a microscopic layer of tiny ridges on all surfaces that pierce the cell wall of germs, instantly destroying them on contact. https://t.co/rskJRHtlqZ

@smonkman Hi Shane, we are very sorry for the time you have spent waiting on hold. Please feel free to send us a direct message if you are still in need of assistance and we would be happy to help. -Nicole https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@QuinnFullerton While I cannot undo the circumstances, this matter has been shared with the appropriate department leadership for internal follow up to ensure that any necessary corrective counseling is provided. - Lupe

@QuinnFullerton We are extremely disappointed to learn that the service you received from our flight attendants did not meet your expectations. All of our team members are expected to be professional, respectful, and assist however they can to provide a satisfactory travel experience.

data.text: @janesalltrades Hi Tanya! What you are inquiring about would require what is called a gate pass. Gate passes are issued by the airport ticket counter agents on the day of travel, at their discretion. For more information on this, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

Meet Mario, who is graduating today with a degree in Air Transportation Management. Happy Graduation Day, Mario! Here's to challenging the notion of the sky being the limit and, instead, working hard to make it your office.

📸: @phxazspotter https://t.co/Xt0ow1WKuT
@EvelynVHair We're so sorry for any frustrations. Please send us a DM, we would be happy to look into this for you. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - Lupe
@JAMisonHeisey Hi there! Please send us a DM and we will be happy to help. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - Lupe
@BekkaPrewitt Hi Bekka! If you still need assistance, please send us a DM. - Lupe
@NbaNerd23 Hi there! We do not require COVID testing before travel. :) - Lupe

@kirbyingram1 @kirbyingram1 Hi Kirby! We will be happy to look into this for you. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/ku7CazEqRu with the voucher number and the email address that goes with it. A member of our team will review your options with you as soon as possible. - C

@mimi_dawn937 @mimi_dawn937 Please send us a DM: https://t.co/IZozrz4iUo  with your confirmation number and email address as well as the specifics of your request. A member of our team will be happy to assist you as soon as possible. - C
Heads or tails? Who else is ready for game day at @AllegiantStadm?! https://t.co/iVsfUc4u7O

@DailyTweets3232 @DailyTweets3232 Congratulations on taking advantage of those card benefits and making the card work for you! We look forward to welcoming you aboard in 2 weeks. 😀 - C
#togetherwefly

This holiday season, our team members have been lending a hand at MANNA FoodBank. Serving people in 16 counties of North Carolina, MANNA moves more than 50,000 lbs. of food each day. Good people doing good things makes all the difference in our communities! #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/bq5WOua04k
@jaym275 @jaym275  Thank you for your service! It's our privilege to welcome you on board! - SG
@LSAviationPhoto @Airbus @LSAviationPhoto @Airbus  Beautiful shot! - SG

@patiencerush @patiencerush I'm very sorry to hear that, Patience. Our crews do their very best to spread passengers out when possible, but there could be several operational reasons that would necessitate a flight being seated in a certain way (i.e. properly balancing the flight). - SG

@andrewblaylock @andrewblaylock I'm very sorry to hear that, Andrew. I assure you that we only cancel flights when absolutely necessary. Please feel free to send us a DM if you need any assistance from our team: https://t.co/iC1QParWGk. - SG
@lapeluax10 @lapeluax10  Just hangin' with our fellow birds! - SG

@BekkaPrewitt @BekkaPrewitt Hi Bekka! Thanks for reaching out. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/iC1QParWGk with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. We will be happy to help you in any way we can. - C
It started with "Elf on a Shelf," but what about "bling on a wing"? 🤣🤣 #JustASuggestion https://t.co/pIWPhu0TQu

#BigTen Champions Week just got even better. We're excited to be teaming up with @theDlasvegas and @stadiumswim at @CircaLasVegas to bring watching your favorite teams to a whole new level of incredible! https://t.co/WiJxipoIRi
@KandiSamples Happy to hear our Flight Attendants were super heroes on your flight! :) - Lupe

@PGFormals We're sorry to learn about your mom's experience. Our size requirement for a pet carrier is 9x16x19. As long as the carrier you purchase for your pet is soft-sided, it should be able to squish down a bit under the seat to fit. Send us a DM if you have questions. - Lupe
@elizabethmstein Hi Elizabeth! We're sorry to hear about your frustrations. Please send us a private message, we would be happy to look into this for you. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - Lupe

data.text:
This Sunday, the @Raiders will take on the @Colts at @AllegiantStadm, which means it's time for another BIG GIVEAWAY! Win autographed team gear or a trip for two to Las Vegas! Enter now: https://t.co/biufHrYalW.

Terms and conditions apply. No purchase necessary. 

📷: @Raiders https://t.co/hMPMwKJknv

@BryanWagyu Hi there! We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. Currently, the hold time is approximately 5 minutes. You are also welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC if you'd like. - C

@cheshie04 @cheshie04 As you make your travel decisions, you might be interested to know that we received the No. 1 spot on this year's Airline Quality Rating. This independent study evaluates the performance and quality of U.S. airlines. Learn more at https://t.co/jUp4FJUmMP. - SG

Let's clear the air - our volatile organic compound (VOC) filters do an outstanding job. They keep the air quality on board exceeding HEPA standards at all times. #GoingTheDistance https://t.co/maMIvrfT7t

@KimChata @KimChata That should be acceptable, as long as the carrier can fit completely underneath the seat in front of you with the pet inside comfortably. You can add a pet to your existing reservation here: https://t.co/7UqTIYnW8C If you need further assistance, please send us a DM - C

urls.title: Pet Travel | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Allegiant permits traveling with pet dogs & cats on flights within the contiguous 48 states and Puerto Rico. Pet travel requirements, fees and pet carrier information.

data.text: @ShelBailey @ShelBailey We're sorry to hear about this. Allegiant only allows small domestic dogs and cats for transport. You can learn more about this here: https://t.co/OjNJjqJadt If you wish to discuss this further, please send us a DM: https://t.co/DuYfGeF1ju - C

@Kellijuana @Kellijuana Hi Kelli! We are sorry to hear about this. We've made it easier for you to change/cancel your itinerary with no penalties by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2GKFhX. If you should need further assistance, please send us a DM. - C

@PHS_IT_Teacher @PHS_IT_Teacher All team members are required to a wear a face covering at all times while performing their duties. Please send us a DM with the names of the representatives in question as well as the flight information so that we may conduct an internal investigation. - C

@TeacherReality @spiritair @TeacherReality While we are not checking temperatures, we have put several measures in place to ensure safety across our operations including a health acknowledgement that must be completed for online/mobile check-in. You can learn more here: https://t.co/MayQtmDF5x - C

@joearrigo @joearrigo We LOVE hearing this! Thank you for taking the time to share this positive feedback. 😊 - C
#togetherwefly

#GoingTheDistance from the moment you check-in! 

Learn more about our health and safety initiatives at https://t.co/Q9VotOPEFY. https://t.co/L266FV13TT
@lucasjcorbett @lucasjcorbett We are excited to welcome you aboard! 😊 Please feel free to DM us if you need assistance or have any questions that we may be able to address for you. - C

@PrettyLilMudder @PrettyLilMudder We are delighted to hear this! Thank you so much for recognizing our efforts. We look forward to serving you again in the future! - C
#togetherwefly

Congratulations to @AllegiantStadm, winner of "Best Venue" at the 2020 World Football Summit Industry Awards! 👏👏👏
https://t.co/ssS4SpuTev

@mads1342_ @mads1342_ I'm sincerely sorry to hear that. Everyone, including our team members, is required to properly wear a mask at all times. Please feel free to send us a private message so we can get the details to share with our team. - SG

@paleogal_devra @paleogal_devra The option to opt-in for notification when/if a flight is booked over 65% capacity can be found at the top of the confirmation email that is sent once a reservation is made. Please fee free to send us a DM if you have further questions or concerns. - C
@AshleySiriusXM @AshleySiriusXM If you think you may have left an item behind on the plane or in the terminal, please complete this Lost and Found request form: https://t.co/NMwFgH5G3k - C

@alisastorres @alisastorres We're sorry to hear about this. Unfortunately, there is a cut off point after which our agents cannot print out boarding passes. The passengers are welcome to reach out to us directly in a DM: https://t.co/79j0bfdcOn if they are in need of assistance. - C

@ACarter867 @ACarter867 Plz review our Luggage Limitations of Liability here: https://t.co/yorLgRoWhG 
"Allegiant Air prohibits the following items being placed in checked baggage and does not accept liability for damage to...computer hardware..." Plz send us a DM w/ any other questions - C

@ProudOhioNative @ProudOhioNative All of our calls are monitored and recorded for quality assurance purposes. We'd like to look into this, as we hold ourselves to the highest standards of customer service. If you are willing to, please send us a DM so that we may investigate this matter. - C
@ProudOhioNative @ProudOhioNative Hi Scott! Thanks for reaching out to us. We'd be happy to look into this for you and help you in any way we can. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/JkL9HdI8v4 - C
@bwebb2016 @bwebb2016 I'm very sorry to hear that, Brandy. We require masks to be worn at all times while traveling, so we will share your feedback with our appropriate teams for review. - SG

@SaurusThesaurus @SaurusThesaurus This information and more is available for your convenience here: https://t.co/hTqVduR5Fi Please feel free to send us a DM if you are in need of assistance. We will gladly help you in any way we can. - C

@paleogal_devra @paleogal_devra While social distancing is top-of-mind for many, it's not always possible onboard an aircraft. Customers with concerns about being on a flight that cannot accommodate social distancing can request to be notified if a booked flight exceeds 65% capacity. - C

@SaurusThesaurus Hi @SaurusThesaurus! Although social distancing is top-of-mind for many, it's not always possible onboard an aircraft. Customers with concerns about being on a flight that cannot accommodate social distancing can request to be notified if a booked flight exceeds 65% capacity. -C

@MBmarkbellis @MBmarkbellis Hi Mark! Our ticket counters will open two (2) hours prior to departure and close promptly 45 minutes prior to departure. If you have further questions or concerns, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/UX08iUv887 - C

@HiPrincessP @HiPrincessP If you have an existing reservation with us and have questions regarding a flight on that reservation, please send us a DM: https://t.co/du31ZWGmNN We will be happy to help you in any way we can. - C
@Michaelkelly707 @DublinAirport @Michaelkelly707 Very cool! Thanks for sharing! - SG
